name: Echoes of the Past 2: The Castle of Shadows
name_original: Echoes of the Past 2: The Castle of Shadows
description:
Echoes of the Past 2: The Castle of Shadows is a game developed by Orneon. It was originally released in 2010. It was published by Big Fish Games.
You can play Echoes of the Past 2: The Castle of Shadows on PC and Classic Macintosh.
